message.entry: If you exit this app now, you may lose unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to exit?

Unable to proceed to the previous screen - {0}
Unable to add widget of type {0} to the specified parent {1} \n Details: {2}
The hardware setup process for {0} is complete.
Examples can not be displayed because the support package root directory is unavailable.
Download the following third-party tools by using the links provided below :
Enter the path where the tools are downloaded and click 'Validate' :
Use the hyperlinks to download third-party tools. Download all tools to a single folder, enter the path in the edit box on the left and click 'Validate'.
Unable to find all archives in the Download folder. Download and Retry again.
Click 'Retry' button below to restart validation.
The following third-party tools are required. Click the Install button to start automatic install process
Click 'Retry' button to restart installation. Or Click Next > to instal the tools manually.

The installation process can take sometime and may require User Account Control permissions. If this request times out, the installation will fail. Watch the complete installation to ensure that this step completes correctly.
For more information on errors during install, refer to the installation log.
Required third-party tools installed successfully. To continue, click Next >

Error downloading the following 3P tools
{0}
To retry automatic download, click 'Retry'. If this error persists, try removing the files from the download folder since they may have been corrupted while downloading. For manual instructions to download the tools, click 'Next'.
Required third-party tools are installed. Click Next > to continue
